main event: A large, round, white object was observed at Fairchild AFB, Washington on 3 December 1957 and disappeared in a flash after 3 seconds.
interesting points: The sighting occurred during the Geminids meteoritic shower., The object was concluded to possibly be a balloon, astronomical object, or aircraft., The observation was visually confirmed and lasted only 3 seconds., The report contains classifications indicating insufficient data for evaluation., The sighting involved a single object.
